website_summaries.verdict: A strong set of stamps designed to last. Simple set is ideal for beginners.
pros: They are advertised to last for 10,000 hammer strikes
Covered in a light oil for rust protection
Lines are crisp, letters and numbers are easy to read
cons: Protective oil coating has a strong odor

customer_reviews.title: Imprint is shallow, inconsistant and very faint
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this based on reviews. They dont stamp well, letters are shallow and some parts of letter don't show and its way too thin and not good enough for stamping jewelry. For example stamping the letter Z, it comes out as a faint "7"...right side of the Z is missing:( ...I even had my husband do it since he has a stronger hand but eh still could not get a nice imprint on soft metal tags. have to return this
customer_reviews.author: EasternWesternTreasure

customer_reviews.title: Handcuff steel is pretty hard.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put my initials on all of my work gear. I was surprised to see that these punches were able to make a mark on my handcuffs. Handcuff steel is pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for a project of punching my kids names onto pennies. One moderately firm tap with a small hammer left a perfect stamp. If I could list any negative with my experience it would be that the letters were not arranged in alphabetical order when I opened the box. That is not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: rvb1976

customer_reviews.title: I stamped some light gauge metal and these worked great. They are well made and at a reasonable ...
customer_reviews.text: I stamped some light gauge metal and these worked great. They are well made and at a reasonable price. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Roth

customer_reviews.title: Marking area (raised letter) is kind of shallow
customer_reviews.text: Marking area (raised letter) is kind of shallow and makes a circle area around the letter. Some letters are OK some are shallow so you have to strike/ hit several times to get a good mark on brass, titanium and cold roll steel.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Works great to stamp/label keys for easy identification
customer_reviews.text: Works great to stamp/label keys for easy identification. Originally assumed the set was missing the #9 stamp. However, I realized that the #6 was intended for both #6 & #9. Great set, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: The box is nice, but I cannot seem to get the letters to completely imprint. It is VERY faint with parts of the letters missing and I am only trying to stamp a soft metal spoon. Very disappointed and will likely return.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Like the "W" for example barely stamps
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok for beginners to practice with. Some letters don't have a lot of definition to them so they don't stamp well. Like the "W" for example barely stamps. Will have to purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Mohler

customer_reviews.title: Worked good, Just need a good smack with the hammer
customer_reviews.text: I used these to stamp numbers in 1018 steel, 1144 steel and brass. Of course the brass was easy. The 1018 took more force and I really needed a good stroke of the hammer for the 1144. All numbers came out legible. The tendency is to hold the hammer in the middle because you want more control and you don't want to flatten your fingers. But you need to hold the hammer towards the end of the handle and take advantage of the length of the handle. Just keep your eye on the end of the stamp and you will hit true.
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Works on STAINLESS STEEL!
customer_reviews.text: I had to read a LOT of descriptions and reviews to find the CORRECT stamps that would work on Stainless steel! These work! I, originally, purchased another set, and they do not work half as well as this one! I recommend this set for ALL types of stamping. Great buy for the $$$!
customer_reviews.author: dodo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; perfect for metal craft projects!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these along with some copper tags to create labels for my plants. This is a great, sturdy set of stamps. The perfect size for the small tags I had. If it's your first time doing metal stamping, I'd suggest getting a somewhat hard surface to place the metal on for stamping -- a thin plastic cutting board over some wood worked perfect for me. This makes the letters come out more crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Niz

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I needed to add serial numbers to guitars, and this worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird Wedbetter

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY, these are toys, not real tools.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe ok for use on wood, but for metal its absolutely embarrassing how bad these are. Letters are about 1/4" and arent deep so they could be more wheeled off no problem. Bought them so i could stamp my name into my metal tools and it wont work for that. I cant think of a single thing these would be good for outside maybe an arts and crafts table at a kindergarten center.
customer_reviews.author: RICK A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on softest metals like Aluminum and copper harder strike for steel and harder materials. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carter

customer_reviews.title: Crap! Poor impressions as the letters are not deeply cut. Hard to read "weak" imprint.
customer_reviews.text: Such a deal NOT! Total waste of money. You can hardly see the imprint because the dies are "shallow" and not cut deep enough to make a quality imprint. I will go find a quality brand. Such a disappointment. If I took the $20 and lit it on fire, I would have had more fun. What junk.
customer_reviews.author: JB Robinson

customer_reviews.title: First set had a bad '4' stamp
customer_reviews.text: The first set I received had a defective '4' stamp, which was missing much of the descender line. I contacted Tarvol and sent photos of a piece of steel I had stamped with the digit stamps. To their credit, they sent me another set for free. These stamps seem to work fine on mild steel.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D ROBERTSON

customer_reviews.title: Number & letter stamping kit
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I wanted for stamping softer metals. Thanks The only problem was that an empty packet showed up the first time, and it then showed up with the punch kit the second time around, after I pointed it out. Unfortunately the way to return the empty packet was by using some sort of emblem on the computer and scan it. Since I am an old man, and not familiar with all these new things, I was not able to return the empty packet, and no return address for returns was made obvious to me. So, Amazon charged twice for 1 punch kit. Oh well, C'est la vie !
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: Works fine in soft steel, aluminum, and other soft metals
customer_reviews.text: Works great for making permanent identification markings on major tools and farm implements.
customer_reviews.author: RJJ

customer_reviews.title: Stamp storage needs separate space for each stamp to keep organized.
customer_reviews.text: Stamp set would be better if each stamp keep separated when you pull one out of storage, they get all mixed up. Also would be if tops of stamps had direction of stamp.. Other then that stamp imprints on keys...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good on soft items
customer_reviews.text: If i had been planning to use these on soft metals or wood they would have worked. I wanted to stamp spoons and silverware items but even with hitting them hard with a hammer it didnt stamp much into the metal. So it didnt do me much good.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: all included numbers and letters included. Everything included usually you can only get alphabets or numbers this one has both
customer_reviews.author: Iggy Araujo

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR LEATHER
customer_reviews.text: Not good for leather at all. Leaves a round circle around the letter. Pretty much useless if you’re looking to stamps letters on leather.
customer_reviews.author: TBone

customer_reviews.title: Soft metal punch
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected for soft metals such as aluminum, but even mild steel prices to be a challenge for them to make an indentation. A very hard hit from a three pound hammer somewhat works but also then distorts the end of the punch. Trade off price for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsy89

customer_reviews.title: works well came as described, the small letters/numbers can ...
customer_reviews.text: works well came as described, the small letters/numbers can be a bit more difficult to stamp, no fault of the product, just how it is when metal stamping.
customer_reviews.author: Huskyhouse

customer_reviews.title: Need the manufacturers tool to use
customer_reviews.text: Didnt realize I needed a different tool to place these in to use. My mistake. I was told these were all standard size and would fit any imprint tool. I have Impress.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works as they should
customer_reviews.text: Needed to stamp some keys and these worked well. Exactly what I needed to do the job. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Francisco

customer_reviews.title: not for steel
customer_reviews.text: had to strike extremely hard to stamp mild steel, making it prone to injury. some letters were unrecognizable
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Not hard or sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: Only good for softer metals. Bad quality. Some letters are not well defined. Buy something better
customer_reviews.author: JD Henao

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried them yet but will update. Upon opening, I smelled oil and was glad about it. The packaging is hard plastic and holds the stamps/punch set well. Happy about the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Antonino C. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Decent punches
customer_reviews.text: I build my own mounts and these are perfect for telling you what you have I love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Stamps not marked on the side
customer_reviews.text: Stamps not marked on the side making it to know witch way the stamp is facing during stamping. Most stamps are marked on the side and you have that side towards you when you use the stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R Maley

customer_reviews.title: Nice usable set
customer_reviews.text: Nice usable set. You should get a metal stamp holder to help you line up your numbers or letters and save your fingers. Good deal good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Prompt delivery. Using to stamp codes on keys and they work great. A bit oily from packaging but easily wiped off. Would love if they were stamped on the sides to make locating them easier, but wasn't a deal breaker when I was deciding on them

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.text: Nice set, and good value.. but not easy to use at all.. I brought them to punch a Bitcoin seed onto steel, but gave up after the first word..

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but effective
customer_reviews.text: They smell like gas. Really strong gasoline. Had to leave them outside for about a week to air out. Otherwise though, pretty good. Does what I have requested of it so far.

customer_reviews.title: these have worked great. I wish they had the letter on the ...
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner stamper, these have worked great. I wish they had the letter on the side and a different case..... they tend to get mixed up then are hard to find the right letter. Other than that, they work great.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertized.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was exactly as described. Used the stamps to label a lot of keys and they did great. No wear that I can see. Good value. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Used to initial brass valve tags and ...

customer_reviews.title: Great for stamping wood
customer_reviews.text: A light touch is all took for me to stamp even very hard wood (cocobolo). The letters are clear and crisp. Quality seems very good.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Characters not super crisp, but adequate. Box has no partitions, but this is not a $100 set, either. Fills a hole in my toolbox.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Way smaller than I expected. Guess I should have paid attention to the photos. Really doesn’t matter though great product. The only negative about this item is the lid does not secure closed and just sits on top. If this falls over everything is coming out.

customer_reviews.title: Some letters don't show up
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the letter K does not show up. When I fist looked at it you could tell the stamp end was rounded so I didn't think it would work, but I gave it a try and sure enough only the center of the K shows up which just looks like a big dot. I will be returning.

customer_reviews.title: a little disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set

product_meta.title: Number and Letter Stamp Set (36 Piece Punch Set/A-Z & 0-9) Industrial Grade Hardened Carbon Steel Metal - 1/8" (3mm) Characters - Perfect for Imprinting Metal, Wood, Plastic, Leather, More!
product_meta.description: Number and Letter Punch Set by Tarvol
feature_bullets: 36 PIECE SET - 26 Uppercase Letters (A through Z) and 10 Numbers ( 0-9)
DESIGNED TO LAST OVER 10,000 STRIKES - Hardened Carbon Steel Strength, Incredibly Durable and Long Lasting!
CONVENIENT HARD PLASTIC STORAGE CASE - Keeps All the Punches Safe & Organized
EASILY STAMPS HARD & SOFT SURFACES - Including Metal, Wood, Plastic, Leather, Aluminum, and So Much More!
100% MANUFACTURER MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Tarvol Guarantees All of It's Products and Tools for Life!
